archetypes.name: The Conquistador
archetypes.description: Bold, independent, driven by novelty and autonomy.

archetypes.name: The Siren
archetypes.description: Emotionally expressive, desires attention and validation.

archetypes.name: The Magistrate
archetypes.description: Controlled, loyal, values stability and order.

archetypes.name: The Sage
archetypes.description: Reflective, analytical, seeks understanding and truth.

archetypes.name: The Explorer
archetypes.description: Adventurous, curious, values growth and discovery.

archetypes.name: The Caregiver
archetypes.description: Nurturing, supportive, finds meaning in serving others.

archetypes.name: The Lover
archetypes.description: Passionate, intimate, seeks deep emotional connection.

archetypes.name: The Creator
archetypes.description: Expressive, innovative, driven to bring new things into being.

archetypes.name: The Innocent
archetypes.description: Optimistic, trusting, seeks happiness and safety.

archetypes.name: The Sage Mentor
archetypes.description: Wise, principled, guided by knowledge and ethics.

archetypes.name: The Everyman
archetypes.description: Grounded, relatable, values belonging and community.
